name: Take Care Of The Emperor
description:
Take Care Of The Emperor!

This game is made for the Extra Credits Game Jam.

Set in the third century, this game tries to apply the theme "Take Care" of the Jam into this time period. How will you take care of the emperor? Protect the emperor from Gauls and Goths and barbarians! Defeat the invaders with your fellow praetorian guards.

Or, will you take care of the emperor, dispose of him and claim the throne for yourself? Be careful though, because the emperor is not an easy foe...

Controls

A/D - Horizontal Movement

Space - Light Attack

F - Heavy Attack

M - Mutiny!!

Hope you'll enjoy this game!

I tried my best to make this game in such a short time period, I apologize for all the bugs and unpolishness, but I just wanted to have fun with this play on words.
